sub-events.comment: For Each Solid Spawn the Shadow
Instantiate Weapon Object from ArrayWpn (This accesses ArayWpn data set which is a Constant data set) WeaponInstantiate(Weapon.UID, Weapon.Name) [eg. WeaponInstantiate(2, "MosinNagant")]
Weapon Object Add Keys from ArrayWpn
Switch Weapon for Unit in ArrayWpn
Load Weapon Object from Invtry (This accesses Invtry data set which is a Varied data set) WeaponLoad(Weapon.UID, Weapon.Name) [eg. WeaponLoad(2, "MosinNagant")]
Weapon Object Add Keys from Invtry
Switch Weapon for Player in Invtry
Player Switch Weapon Data (Next, set player’s weapon instance variables from the dictionary values) WeaponSwitch(Weapon.UID, Weapon.Name) [eg. WeaponSwitch(2, "MosinNagant")]
WeaponShoot(Unit.UID, Unit.ID) [eg. WeaponShoot(Player.UID, "Ally")] This checks what type of weapon is being shot and decides on the weapon action
Update the Bullets Left in Magazine

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You got the Documents. Now Get Out of Here!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Congratulations you got the Documents and made it Out Alive!"&newline&"Thank you for Playing!"
